description: The MiG-19P is an interceptor. It is similar from the MiG-19S day fighter, but has the RP-1 Izumrud radar and omits the gun under the fuselage. This late variant has two 30 mm NR-30 cannons in place of the two 23 mm NR-23 cannons of the early version. The NATO reporting name for the aircraft is Farmer-B and for the radar is Scan Odd.
loadnotes: May use 760L FTs on stations 1 and 4.
May use ORO-57K RPs on stations 2 and 3. From 1957, may use DRs each with two ORO-57K RPs on stations 2 and 3.
